ComicInfo.Title: The Man Who Could Not Die!; Weird Facts; Me, Ghost; The Hangman Who Was Hanged; Strange Footprints; Angkor City of Mystery; The Evil Cornucopia; Romance of Death
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Man Who Could Not Die!: A man hires a hitman to kill him because he is actually 5000 years old and wants to die.
Weird Facts: Apparently true facts such as the recorded notes of a banshee's wail.
Me, Ghost: A guy uses his girlfriend as a human shield against a robber.
The Hangman Who Was Hanged: Public executioner in England is hanged himself.
Strange Footprints: Klondike gold prospector kills his fellow prospectors and ends up haunted by their ghosts.
Angkor City of Mystery: Mystery behind the origins of the city of Angkor in Cambodia.
The Evil Cornucopia: A man gets a cornucopia that can protect him from harm.
Romance of Death: A man's ghost comes back for his wife in a fishing village on the California coast.
